column4: I messed up my iptables on 7.10 now neither LAN nor wifi gets Internet connection. How can I restore them to the default settings?
RoAkSoAx: i played with iptables when trying to set up internet connection sharing. that never worked and neither has the internet since :)
Did you by any chance also setup a ( possibly incorrect ) static configuration rather than DHCP?
no, its on dhcp now...and neither eth0 or 1 function
